text.data: Taicho: They are creatures I have never seen before!![end1][end]
Matelite: What the hell are these monsters?![0xfc][0x1] They just appeared out of a hole the sky!![end1][end]
They are not monsters from Orelus![end1][end]
[character][0x1]: Be careful, [0xfc][0x1][character][0x1].[0xfc][0x1] The Holy Dragons are confused too...[end1][end]
What are they?[0xfc][0x1] I've never seen any monsters like these before...[0xfc][0x1][end1][end]
Sendak: Be careful, [0xfc][0x1][character][0x1].[0xfc][0x1] I do not know what they are...[end1][end]
What in the name of Kahna are they?[end1][end]
